What are the treatments for lactose intolerance ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of lactose intolerance:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital lactase deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Nonpersistence of intestinal lactase  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Lactose Intolerance  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Lactose Tolerance Tests   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health con
